trans-unit.source: Use network address: Use the network address instead of the ip address
Network Mask: What network mask should get used(default 255.255.255.0). Changing this will result in invalid saved network addresses and you have to login once again to refresh the entry.
Display accounts: Display accounts instead of automatically logging in in the first account with the highest privileges. No password required if chosen from these accounts. (Not implemented yet)
Allow local network: If accessed from the local network ignore selected useNetworkAddress option and allow the local network address. Selects the highest authorized user who logged in the last.
